name: PiBakery
description: The blocks based, easy to use setup tool for Raspberry Pi
author: David Ferguson <david@pibakery.org>

scripts.setup: npm install && if uname | grep Darwin; then mkdir -p '/Library/Application Support/PiBakery/os/'; fi
scripts.build-mac: find . -name .DS_Store -depth -exec rm {} \; && npm dedupe && electron-packager ./ PiBakery --platform=darwin --arch=all --electron-version=1.3.2 --overwrite --prune --app-version=0.3.8 --icon=./app/img/icon.icns
scripts.build-linux: find . -name .DS_Store -depth -exec rm {} \; && npm dedupe && electron-packager ./ PiBakery --platform=linux --arch=all --electron-version=1.3.2 --overwrite --prune --app-version=0.3.8 --icon=./app/img/icon.icns
